attributes.additional_details: St Aldhelms Football Club has been running for over 100 years and plays its football at Headley Park Primary School under a Lease with Bristol City Council. Recent decisions being made my the Chair of Governors of Headley Park Primary School are threatening the existence of the football. These decisions need to be investigated by the Council. Please sign to show your support for the football club.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council, though you might want to involve your local MP in your campaign.
